quote: To enjoy the glow of good health, you must exercise.
name: Gene Tunney

quote: Take care of your body. It's the only place you have to live.
name: Jim Rohn

quote: Fitness is not about being better than someone else... It's about being better than you used to be.
name: Khloe Kardashian

quote: The purpose of training is to tighten up the slack, toughen the body, and polish the spirit.
name: Morihei Ueshiba

quote: The human body is the best picture of the human soul.
name: Ludwig Wittgenstein

quote: A muscle is like a car. If you want it to run well early in the morning, you have to warm it up.
name: Florence Griffith Joyner

quote: Walking is the best possible exercise. Habituate yourself to walk very far.
name: Thomas Jefferson

quote: Reading is to the mind what exercise is to the body.
name: Joseph Addison

quote: The reason I exercise is for the quality of life I enjoy.
name: Kenneth H. Cooper

quote: In fitness, there are no short cuts. It involves immense discipline and hard work.
name: Mahesh Babu

quote: True enjoyment comes from activity of the mind and exercise of the body; the two are ever united.
name: Wilhelm von Humboldt

quote: Time and health are two precious assets that we don't recognize and appreciate until they have been depleted.
name: Denis Waitley

quote: Fitness helps me think better, feel better, and move better.
name: Jason Winston George

quote: Swimming is normal for me. I'm relaxed. I'm comfortable, and I know my surroundings. It's my home.
name: Michael Phelps

quote: Practice puts brains in your muscles.
name: Sam Snead

quote: A lot of people are afraid of heights. Not me, I'm afraid of widths.
name: Steven Wright

quote: Your body is the church where Nature asks to be reverenced.
name: Marquis de Sade

quote: Fitness is not an option. It's part of my job.
name: Alison Sweeney

quote: Health is the thing that makes you feel that now is the best time of the year.
name: Franklin Pierce Adams

quote: My fitness journey will be a lifelong journey.
name: Khloe Kardashian

quote: No one's ever achieved financial fitness with a January resolution that's abandoned by February.
name: Suze Orman

quote: It's so easy to lose your fitness and so hard to gain it back.
name: Alex Morgan

quote: Health is the vital principle of bliss, and exercise, of health.
name: James Thomson

quote: It's challenging, but you have to at least try to eat right and exercise.
name: Joely Fisher

quote: You can always improve your fitness if you keep training.
name: Pastor Maldonado

quote: A feeble body weakens the mind.
name: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

quote: Exercise should be regarded as tribute to the heart.
name: Gene Tunney

quote: In my judgment, physical fitness is basic to all forms of excellence and to a strong, confident nation.
name: Robert Kennedy

quote: Fitness has nothing to do with age.
name: Virender Sehwag

quote: In the midst of these hard times it is our good health and good sleep that are enjoyable.
name: Knute Nelson

quote: I try and groom myself, be it through fitness or dance.
name: Yami Gautam

quote: My job is to be fit and I'm really blessed that I get to go and work out and live a really healthy lifestyle.
name: Kerri Walsh Jennings

quote: Our growing softness, our increasing lack of physical fitness, is a menace to our security.
name: John F. Kennedy

quote: My own preferred fitness regime is to use my bicycle.
name: Paul Hollywood

quote: A life coach does for the rest of your life what a personal trainer does for your health and fitness.
name: Elaine MacDonald

quote: Exercise is labor without weariness.
name: Samuel Johnson

quote: Health and fitness is who I am. It's what I do.
name: Lee Haney

quote: Personally, I need a high level of physical fitness in order to feel at ease.
name: Jurgen Klinsmann

quote: My fitness instructor helped me with strength training, muscle building, and toning.
name: Karan Patel

quote: I can work hard and be disciplined like a soldier, but I could never reach their level of fitness.
name: Richard C. Armitage

quote: Fitness is a luxury when you are busy!
name: Lauren Conrad

quote: Muscles come and go; flab lasts.
name: Bill Vaughan

quote: I consider fitness, diet, and beauty to be essential to a balanced self.
name: Hannah Bronfman

quote: You must also give mental and physical fitness priority.
name: Jim Otto

quote: Exercise is done against one's wishes and maintained only because the alternative is worse.
name: George A. Sheehan

quote: Resting for me is fitness training.
name: Jenson Button

quote: Fitness needs to be perceived as fun and games or we subconsciously avoid it.
name: Alan Thicke

quote: Because I take care of my body, it doesn't look like the body of a woman of my years.
name: Gloria Swanson

quote: I have never taken any exercise, except sleeping and resting, and I never intend to take any.
name: Mark Twain

quote: Tactics, fitness, stroke ability, adaptability, experience, and sportsmanship are all necessary for winning.
name: Fred Perry

quote: Exercise is amazing, from the inside out. I feel so alive and have more energy.
name: Vanessa Hudgens

quote: Fitness, in my opinion, is a mental exercise more than just physical.
name: Anushka Shetty

quote: The first time I see a jogger smiling, I'll consider it.
name: Joan Rivers

quote: Fitness is really important for my mental and emotional equilibrium as well as my physical wellbeing.
name: Robert Rinder

quote: I've exercised with women so thin that buzzards followed them to their cars.
name: Erma Bombeck

quote: Exercise is the chief source of improvement in our faculties.
name: Hugh Blair

quote: I swim like a fish and I have an amazing kick.
name: Gordon Ramsay

quote: I don't lift weights. I do fitness exercises to stay strong.
name: Chad le Clos

quote: For exercise, I now run with my chocolate Lab puppy, Oscar.
name: Daniela Pestova

quote: I do yoga, I do Bikram and I run, and I eat really healthy.
name: Lady Gaga

quote: My fitness is good. I hope to improve it even further during training.
name: Andriy Shevchenko

quote: In the British Special Air Service, combat fitness is all about running.
name: Bear Grylls

quote: Fitness, defending, the mental stuff - those were all weaknesses of mine. And I turned those into strengths.
name: Carli Lloyd

quote: Teaching kids about health and fitness is important to me. It's about being fit for life.
name: Jackie Joyner-Kersee

quote: I've been into exercise my whole life, been a runner and been into health and fitness always.
name: Sissy Spacek

quote: My weight fluctuates depending on my mood and my current devotion to my fitness routine.
name: Lena Dunham

quote: A runner must run with dreams in his heart, not money in his pocket.
name: Emil Zatopek

quote: I never stop working when I'm on stage, and that's my fitness.
name: Jessie J

quote: I concentrate on exercises from the waist down, since that is the laziest part of a woman's body.
name: Tina Louise

quote: You gotta have a body.
name: Jayne Mansfield

quote: Fitness really changed my life.
name: Jon Jones

quote: The only weights I lift are my dogs.
name: Olivia Newton-John

quote: I do not usually follow a rigid fitness regimen, and most of it depends upon what goals I have in my mind.
name: Gautam Gambhir

quote: One needs to be clear headed. I believe in all-round fitness.
name: Gautam Gambhir

quote: For a while after college, I was thinking of becoming a fitness trainer, and I am a certified aqua trainer.
name: Dylan Lauren

quote: I understand only three things - films, fitness, and food.
name: Rakul Preet Singh

quote: You can't be fat and fast, too; so lift, run, diet and work.
name: Hank Stram

quote: The only way for a rich man to be healthy is by exercise and abstinence, to live as if he were poor.
name: William Temple

quote: I've been into fitness since I was 13.
name: Ginger Zee

quote: I'm really into fitness, so my hobbies are yoga, Pilates, and working out.
name: Charlotte McKinney

quote: Find fitness with fun dancing. It is fun and makes you forget about the dreaded exercise.
name: Paula Abdul

quote: So I've broadened the fitness concept to make it one of moderation and balance.
name: Kenneth H. Cooper

quote: I have been passionate about fitness from a very young age.
name: Varun Dhawan

quote: I am pleased with the fitness that I have.
name: Lin Dan

quote: I'm not a fitness model; I'm just a singer. If people focus on that, that's what I care about.
name: Alessia Cara

quote: What I do is I'm trying to bridge the gap between yoga and fitness.
name: Mandy Ingber

quote: In Sevens, fitness is crucial, and it's going to come down to how quickly my body gets in shape.
name: Nick Cummins

quote: Oh, and once, when I was in the Marines, I got a perfect score on my physical fitness test.
name: Drew Carey

quote: I was excited 'Maxim' wanted me to be in Expert Fitness.
name: Bobby Lashley

quote: Just as you can't blindly follow fashion, you can't follow fitness, either.
name: Anushka Sharma

quote: I have a tremendous passion for fitness, I love challenges and I am a very driven guy.
name: Lou Ferrigno

quote: 15 minutes a day! Give me just this and I'll prove I can make you a new man.
name: Charles Atlas

quote: I treat health and fitness as looking after myself.
name: Iskra Lawrence

quote: I didn't have the same fitness or ability as the other girls, so I had to beat them with my mind.
name: Martina Hingis

quote: We spend millions on fitness each year, yet we seem to get fatter.
name: Mary Pilon

quote: I became a fitness fiend when I was about 17 or 18.
name: Cynthia Erivo

quote: When I'm on the road, I'll break my exercise into a cardio session and a weights session.
name: Robert Irvine

quote: Making fitness a priority will energize you, make you look and feel better, and help diffuse stress.
name: Mary Helen Bowers

quote: I think a basic level of fitness can help the body cope with all manner of incidents.
name: Richard Hammond

quote: I try and maintain a little bit of fitness, man.
name: Frank Bruno

quote: In terms of fitness and battling through cancer, exercise helps you stay strong physically and mentally.
name: Grete Waitz

quote: I am concentrating on my fitness levels so that I don't look old.
name: Sonu Nigam

quote: Overall, I think I'm in pretty good shape, but I'm not really someone that is gung-ho or a fitness fanatic.
name: Cobi Jones

quote: I am not a fitness freak, but I do my regular exercises.
name: Uday Kiran

quote: I'm 33 now and I seem to have hit a fitness plane. Shifting the wobbly bits isn't as easy as it used to be.
name: Matthew Rhys

quote: I would rather exercise than read a newspaper.
name: Kim Alexis

quote: I'm enjoying myself this year and for once I'm not chasing my fitness.
name: Jamie Redknapp

quote: Dancing improved my fitness level and endurance.
name: Hazel Keech

quote: When I do get time, I like to hike and I take lots of vitamins and powders to keep healthy.
name: Catherine Bell

quote: I can't promote fitness tea for the rest of my life.
name: Karrueche Tran

quote: My first love is football. When I get the chance, I play football for fitness.
name: Fidel Edwards

quote: Pole dancing is a great way to enhance your fitness level and also your dancing abilities.
name: Kriti Kharbanda

quote: Yoga's an amazing release.
name: Monica Keena

quote: I have to thank the coach for looking after my fitness and allowing me to feel my way into the tournament.
name: Bastian Schweinsteiger

quote: I might do a fitness video. Actually, more of a fatness video.
name: Sanjeev Bhaskar

quote: My bottom is so big it's got its own gravitational field.
name: Carol Vorderman

quote: I'm still very professional about my fitness. I stay in trim as I always did.
name: Peter Shilton

quote: There are similarities between business and sport, in the pressures involved and in the fitness aspect too.
name: Peter Shilton

quote: I'm freakishly competitive, so I set a date to achieve a certain weight or fitness.
name: Jamie Bamber

quote: Once you are over 30, 35 years old, I think everyone should get down to the gym and start moving again.
name: Warren Cuccurullo

quote: The health industry, the fitness industry, was really starting to pick up. This was around the mid 80's.
name: Warren Cuccurullo

quote: I love to swim for miles; I could just go back and forth.
name: Jill Clayburgh

quote: I like exercise. I like a healthy body.
name: Erin Gray

quote: Shearer could be at 100 per cent fitness, but not peak fitness.
name: Graham Taylor

quote: I love Nautilus and stretching. The results are immediate, and that gives me the motivation to continue.
name: Donna Dixon

quote: One of my assets is my fitness. My fitness around the net and my movement: that's my defense to the power.
name: Cara Black

quote: My Daddy liked physical fitness and wanted me to be a prizefighter.
name: Judy Johnson
